bird_report.measures_taken: The species is protected in Poland. Hunting is forbidden. In the framework of agri-environmental schemes measures which foster the Lapwing’s conservation are undertaken. Breeding population is monitored in the National bird monitoring programme.

bird_report.measures_taken: The species is protected in Poland. Hunting is forbidden. National SAP is under preparation. In the framework of agri-environmental schemes measures which foster the Eurasian Curlew’s conservation are undertaken. Breeding population is monitored.

bird_report.measures_taken: The species is protected in Poland. Hunting is forbidden. The most important areas for the Common Gull are protected as SPAs. The species is monitored in the National bird monitoring programme both in breeding and winter seasons.
